org.springframework.data.redis.connection.lettuce

类 AuthenticatingRedisClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lettuce.core.AbstractRedisClient
      • io.lettuce.core.RedisClient
        • org.springframework.data.redis.connection.lettuce.AuthenticatingRedisClient
  • 已过时。 
    since 1.6 - Please use RedisURI.setPassword(String)

    @Deprecated
public class AuthenticatingRedisClient
extends io.lettuce.core.RedisClient
    Extension of RedisClient that calls auth on all new connections using the supplied credentials

      • connect

        public <K,V> io.lettuce.core.api.StatefulRedisConnection<K,V> connect(io.lettuce.core.codec.RedisCodec<K,V> codec)
        已过时。 
        从类复制的说明: io.lettuce.core.RedisClient
        Open a new connection to a Redis server. Use the supplied codec to encode/decode keys and values.
        覆盖:
        connect 在类中 io.lettuce.core.RedisClient
        类型参数:
        K - Key type
        V - Value type
        参数:
        codec - Use this codec to encode/decode keys and values, must not be null
        返回:
        A new stateful Redis connection
